735230.name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi - シナリオ「長篠の戦い」/Scenario "The Battle of Nagashino"
735230.description:
An aditional scenario available for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi."

A great star falls. With the death of the head of the Takeda clan, it appeared the Takeda offensive was over. However, even without Shingen, the Takeda weren't finished. Katsuyori, the heir of the Tiger, continued to expand with the same momentum as his predecessor. The revolutionary Nobunaga chose to fight the Takeda, the greatest force of the Sengoku period, with new strategies. The battle that would overturn the common sense of battle was about to start.

▼How to use
To play, select "New Game." Then from the scenario selection screen select "NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi:Scenario The Battle of Nagashino."
735230.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
